item.title: The PM Role in the Agentic AI World
item.description:
The Core Transformation: From Translator to Problem Shaper

The translation layer between customers and engineers is compressing. When agents can convert well-formed problems into working code, PMs shift from writing specs for engineers to forming intent clearly enough that agents can act directly. The spec is becoming the product.

Traditional PM workflow (weeks) vs. Agentic PM workflow (hours)

The New PM Skillset

1. Problem Shaping (The Primary Skill)

item.title: From Cheap Code to Real Change: What 2026 Demands
item.description:
2025: When Code Became Cheap â€” and Everything Else Became Visible

2025 is the year code stopped being the scarce thing.

With agentic development tools: Claude Code, Codex CLI, Gemini CLI, and others - engineers can now generate huge amounts of software: prototypes, migrations, refactors, tests, docs, analysis scripts, and all the glue work we used to put off. The daily experience of programming has shifted. Less time typing, more time directing and reviewing.
